entry.name: size
entry.title: Size Effect
entry.desc: Resize an element to a specified width and height.

option.name: to
option.desc: Height and width to resize to.{ height: .., width: .. }

option.name: origin
option.desc: The vanishing point, default for show/hide.

option.name: scale
option.desc: Which areas of the element will be resized: 'both', 'box', 'content' Box resizes the border and padding of the element Content resizes any content inside of the element.

example.css: div { margin: 0px; width: 100px; height: 80px; background: green; border: 1px solid black; position: relative; }
